name: ReSearch Pharmaceutical Services
overview: Research Pharmaceutical Services, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides integrated clinical development solutions and services to the bio-pharmaceutical industry. The companyâ€™s solutions include clinical trial project management, site management and study monitoring, patient enrollment, data collection and management, statistical analysis and report writing, quality assurance, and regulatory and medical affairs services. Its services support the design, initiation, and management of its clientsâ€™ clinical trial programs. The company provides services in connection with trials in various therapeutic areas, including cardiovascular, oncology, infectious diseases, neurology, allergy/immunology, endocrinology/metabolism, gastroenterology, obstetrics/gynecology, orthopedics, pediatrics, and psychiatry. It has operations in North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Fort Washington, Pennsylvania.

milestones.description: CRO braves the public market, files for $100M IPO
